sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin memesan satu nasi kuning dan satu daging ayam panggang
english translation: I want to order one nasi kuning and one grilled chicken

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bisakah saya melihat daftar minuman?

english translation: Waiter, please bring the grilled chicken to this table

sentence in indonesian using the words: Satu jus jeruk, terima kasih
english translation: One orange juice, please

sentence in indonesian using the words: Makanan di restoran ini sangat sedap
english translation: The food in this restaurant is very tasty

english translation: I feel delicious while eating banana bread

english translation: Kids like to drink chocolate milk every morning

english translation: Please bring salt and pepper to this table

english translation: This banana bread is made from fresh bananas

sentence in indonesian using the words: Es teh adalah minuman favorit saya di musim panas
english translation: Iced tea is my favorite drink in the summer

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memesan satu gelas es kopi
english translation: I order one glass of iced coffee

english translation: This sweet soy sauce pairs well with fried rice
